mapper.select: SELECT facility_no facilityNo, category_cd categoryCd, facility_name facilityName, facility_note facilityNote, use_yn useYn, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM facility_base WHERE facility_no = #{facilityNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facility_base( category_cd, facility_name, facility_note, reg_dtime, mod_dtime, reg_id, mod_id) VALUES ( #{categoryCd}, #{facilityName}, #{facilityNote}, NOW(), NOW(), #{regId}, #{regId})
mapper.update: UPDATE facility_base SET category_cd = #{categoryCd}, facility_name = #{facilityName}, facility_note = #{facilityNote}, use_yn = #{useYn}, mod_dtime = NOW(), mod_id = #{regId} WHERE facility_no = #{facilityNo}
